content:
Hello
A quick question/observation of Subscription framework.
Following sections have statements such as 'Example using.........':
http://build.fhir.org/subscriptiontopic.html#resource-operation-create
http://build.fhir.org/subscriptiontopic.html#resource-operation-delete
http://build.fhir.org/subscriptiontopic.html#resource-operation-update

I'm assuming these statements are intended to be hyperlink. If my understanding is incorrect let me when know where I can find such examples.

2'nd question : Does the element Subscription.filterBy.searchParamName accepts chained parameter?
build.fhir.org is a development platform, the version of the spec there is not final and is subject to change (at any moment).
Suggest subscribing to #subscriptions for this discussion

Hello @David Pyke Thanks for pointing that. Any thoughts on the 2nd question.

Thanks @Josh Mandel, I'll subscribe to that.
